cardiac_history: No cardiac history, normal EKG on file from 2024 annual physical, echo 2023 showed normal EF 60%, no CAD risk factors

expected_issues.description: Coronary artery bypass graft billed for patient with no cardiac disease history
Cardiac catheterization billed for patient with excellent cardiac health

documents.content: 42-year-old female presents for annual wellness visit. Patient reports excellent health, exercises regularly (runs 5K three times weekly). PMH: seasonal allergies, mild asthma well-controlled with albuterol PRN. No cardiac symptoms. Vitals: BP 118/72, HR 62, regular rhythm. Physical exam unremarkable. Recent labs: Total cholesterol 165, HDL 68, LDL 82, triglycerides 75. Patient is non-smoker, no family history of early CAD. Continue current management.

line_items.description: Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine, established patient, age 40-64
Coronary artery bypass, using arterial graft(s); single arterial graft
Catheter placement in coronary artery(s) for coronary angiography
